title: Penta as client goes offline!
body: So I'm doing well on Vayne, it gets to the last team fight, Nasus teleports to a ward in mid botside brush. Sejuani winds up a great ult as she q's into the Teemo and Trundle. Yasuo ults but has been feeding all game and has no damage. The Teemo manages to flash off to the side but at this point I reach the fight. I pick off Teemo, then make my way across the mid lane and tumble in to get the first auto attack off, melting him with the aid of Nasus e, I kill the Trundle. I then proceed to bait the Master Yi into the wall and ult tumble to get to the other side of him and getting the stun off. That's the triple. I then flash over the Lux e q combo and heal to gain move speed to catch the Jinx who dies to a tumble charged auto attack crit. By this time Lux's spell rotation has come full circle and she manages to land a bind onto Nasus and I while taking an auto attack that may have killed her if not for barrier, and at this point she flashes to further get behind the turret. At this point I am thinking it is out of reach, but hero Nasus flash whithers and I get in range to get the last auto attack securing the penta. Within 5 seconds of the announcer calling "Penta Kill!" everyone disconnects and I am happy yet sad that the game isn't recorded D':

replies.body:
Games in progress don't get kicked out when they bring the client down

I think
Definitely was like that at one point. Although, I'm not up to date on LoL maintenance procedures.
